headline.title: Book your next Adventure
headline.description: Now you are at the right place to find and book your next great adventure!

what.title: We will connect you to the most amazing adventures
what.description: BookingAdventure is a marketplace that brings together all kinds and levels of outdoor adventure activities provided by specialized professionals willing to make it a great experience.

item1.title: Do what you love
item1.description: Through BookingAdventure you will have access to amazing new places to practice the sports you love.

item2.title: Community
item2.description: Join a community of like-minded people, receive stories, tips and reviews about the adventures and as result have the power to decide which next adventure to choose.

item3.title: Safety
item3.description: BookingAdventure requires that every adventure has its own safe-kit...

item4.title: Warrancy
item4.description: Book and pay for your adventure right at BookingAdventure. If you were not satisfied with the experience you can have your money back.

belief.title: We believe that in the end of our lives what will remain with us will be our memories. Therefore, we seek to have them full of stories to tell of great lived adventures.

item1.title: Explore
item1.description: Navegue pelos tipos de aventura que você mais gosta e utilize os filtros para encontrar a sua próxima grande aventura.

item2.title: Reserve
item2.description: Escolha (o) dia(s) para realização da aventura, agende e pague diretamente pelo BookingAdventure.

item3.title: Prepare-se
item3.description: Cada aventura possui exigências por parte do aventureiro para que esteja preparado para realizar as atividades durante a aventura.

item4.title: Viva
item4.description: Chegou o dia. Siga as instruções definidas pelo especialista para início da aventura e viva essa grande experiência!

item1.title: Live new experiences
item1.description: Get out of your comfort zone, have new experiences and be a better person.

item2.title: Discover the world
item2.description: Go outdoor, explore and discover amazing new places the nature provides us.

item4.title: Collect lifetime Memories
item4.description: Come back with the most valuable item, lifetime memories, and a lot of great stories to tell.

form.title: Join our community of adventurers!
form.description: Sign Up and you will be informed about BookingAdventure launch.
form.name: Full Name

providers.title: Want to join our community of Professional Providers?
providers.description: Are you passionate about what you do and willing to provide amazing experiences to our adventurers?

item1.title: Free
item1.description: No cost to list your adventures in BookingAdventure. You only pay a fee when you make a sale.

item3.title: Management
item3.description: With BookingAdventure tools you will be able to manage your bookings and payments wherever you are.

item4.title: Support Team
item4.description: Whenever you need we are here to help you.

form.title: Go ahead. Fill out the form below and we get back to you.
